Comment:
Tables of data \
can be expressed using the Ada language, together with type-wide \
contracts (predicates or invariants).

GNAT Studio can display code and \
navigate through the code as a support for walkthrough activities.

When contracts are \
expressed within the SPARK subset, their correctness can \
be formally verified.

GNAT Studio can display code and navigate through \
the code as a support for walkthrough activities.
